page.title: 03THE STOUR
page.content: IN OUR VILLAGE THERE IS A RIVER CALLED THE STOUR AND IT FLOWS RIGHT THROUGH OUR BLOCK. IN PART OF THE RIVER THERE IS A LITTLE ISLAND AND IT BELONGS TO A FARMER AND YOU CAN ROW UP THERE IN A SMALL ROWING BOAT BUT YOU WOULD HAVE TO ROW AGAINST THE CURRENT. BEHIND THE RIVER THERE IS A FIELD CALLED WALNUT TREE FIELD AND ON THE OTHER SIDE THERE IS A FIELD THAT BELONGS TO A FARMER.IN SOME PARTS OF THE RIVER IT IS DEEP AND IN SOME PARTS IT IS WEEDY AND THE CURRENT IS QUITE STRONG.A LITTLE WAY PAST THE ISLAND IS A BRIDGE CALLED WHITE MILL,IT IS VERY OLD AND IT GOES OVER THE STOUR.THERE ARE FISH IN THE RIVER,TROUT,PIKE, MINNOW,DACE AND PERCH.IF YOU HAVE A SPECIAL LICENCE YOU CAN FISH FROM THE BANK.
